description: Jack and Coke is a great drink for those looking for something with an easy taste to it. It is light, refreshing, and perfect for anyone who wants something different than the usual beer or wine.
name: Jack And Coke

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a short glass with ice cubes. Add whiskey and fill the rest of the way up with Coca-Cola, stirring it slightly to mix everything.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a short glass with ice cubes. Add whiskey and fill the rest of the way up with Coca-Cola, stirring it slightly to mix everything.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a lemon twist if desired. Drink responsibly!
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a lemon twist if desired. Drink responsibly!
